content.text: Hey there, I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood today, what are you up to?
I'm going to spend time with my family and friends, what is your favorite movie from your childhood?
My favorite movie from my childhood is The NeverEnding Story.
I've never seen that movie, what is it about?
It is a fantasy movie about a boy named Bastian Balthazar Bux who gets lost in a magical world called Fantasia.
That sounds like an amazing movie, I'll have to check it out.
It really is! It has a lot of heart and is so much fun to watch.
I love watching movies that are fun and heartwarming.
Me too, that's why I love The NeverEnding Story so much.
I'm going to have to go now, but I'll be sure to check out that movie. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem, I hope you enjoy it
